title: Hextech
body:
> Each time you **win any matchmade game**, there’s a chance you’ll earn a key and winning with friends increases the chance of a key drop. Generally, you can expect to earn a few keys each month.

is Coop AI considered a matchmade game as i am matching with people on my team or is it only ranked and normals and aram?

replies.body:
Coop vs Ai is not considered a matchmade game, as matchmade would be PvP not just P with P. As of now ARAM and TT do not give you rankings and thus do not earn you chests.

As of now only Ranked and Normal SR will earn you chests.

I'm not sure about keys though. Personally I haven't received any key fragments from ARAM or TT, and I'm fairly certain you also only get keys from SR, but I'm not 100% sure on that.
